jd: From: Anshu Chaudhary, Steneral Consulting Inc. anshu@steneral.com Reply to: anshu@steneral.com Job Title - Business Operations Specialist Location - East Peoria, IL- hybrid Visa: Green Card Holder, US Citizen Rate $40/hr. on C2C only Description - Develop standard data analysis procedures with automation Monthly reporting of R&E budget, project financials Fulfill data analyst role on select Lifecycle projects Typical task breakdown:- Create process map of existing manual data collection/analysis needs through collaboration with subject matter experts- Develop data tools to automate collection, analysis and report generation after exhausting opportunities for replication through collaboration with enterprise process partners and peers Interaction with team:- Daily collaboration with Drivetrain Lifecycle team members- Weekly engagement with enterprise process partners and SME’s Education & Experience Required:- Bachelor’s degree in business management, economics, finance, accounting, engineering or relevant field- Minimum 3 years relevant industry experience Technical Skills(Required) MS O365 applications, including PowerApp development Experience with DMAIC principles of project execution (Desired) Power-BI or Tableau data visualization development Familiarity and understanding of mechanical drivetrain components Soft Skills(Required) Process-oriented mindset, disciplined in developing and following a process Ability to communicate with a cross-functional audience (engineering, procurement, supply chain, accounting) Ability to engage others to take action on identified opportunities (Desired) Clifton Strengths: Achiever, Analytical, Discipline, Ideation, Relator Thanks & Regards, Anshu Chaudhary Ass. Team Lead-Talent Acquisition -North America Direct: +1 302-440-2497 anshu@steneral.com
